name: Apex Particle
description: Apex Particle Shooter, A  HARD, frantic, crazy , fast paced shooter  bullet hell game or Shoot 'Em Up , cross over 25 incredible looking levels and music tracks to beat the scores and enemies in your way. Initially was developed exclusively for the windows store, Pc, Tablets, Phones & Xbox One Under the Xbox Live creators Program. But now found its way to Itch.io
